item.description:
Get out your Irish Green and get ready to welcome spring at Bills Seafood, located in Westbrook, CT (over the singing bridge). Join us for a fun filled Sunday afternoon of great food, live entertainment, casual atmosphere and plenty of Irish music and green beer.
Unfortunately Bills does not accept reservations but can accommodate a large crowd. In fact, this place draws such a crowd for St. Patrick's Day weekend that they put up a heated tent with additional tables.

Since I can't guarantee tables inside near the band, I post this meetup as a suggestion, FYI etc..... and not one of our usual meetup events. I plan to be there with some friends and family and as always the more the merrier. But this is one case where everyone fends for themselves... That being said, TRUST me its worth checking out !!


Music is from 4-7 :30pm but my advice is to get there early to grab a table. Parking can be a little tricky so carpooling is also suggested.

Visit the website for more details and directions.....

http://www.billsseafo...

Hope to see you there.

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Pre - Saint Patrick's Day Celebration
